Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dungeon_escape
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dungeon_escape.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dungeon_escape.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents the core game state and logic. It manages all game entities, physics, collisions, and rendering.

    • isNearCraftingPlant

      public boolean isNearCraftingPlant()
      Checks if the player is near a crafting plant (PLANT_BIG). The proximity is determined by a 50x50 unit area around the plant.
      Returns:
      true if player is within crafting range of a big plant, false otherwise

    • craftPotion

      public boolean craftPotion()
      Attempts to craft a potion if conditions are met: 1. Player is near a crafting plant (PLANT_BIG) 2. Player has at least 2 plant items in inventory Consumes 2 plants from inventory and adds 1 potion
      Returns:
      true if potion was successfully crafted, false otherwise

    • damageEnemies

      public void damageEnemies()

    • checkLevelBounds

      public void checkLevelBounds()
      Checks and enforces level boundaries to prevent player from going out of bounds. Handles collisions with: - Bottom (ground level) - Left/right walls - Top ceiling Adjusts player position and physics state accordingly.

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(boolean left, boolean right, boolean jump)

    • getItemsToDraw

      public DrawableItem[] getItemsToDraw()
      Gathers all drawable game items in proper render order: 1. Background 2. Platforms 3. Door 4. Enemies 5. Collectible items 6. Player 7. Inventory (if open)
      Returns:
      Array of DrawableItems in render order

    • reset

      public void reset()

    • reloadLevel

      public void reloadLevel(String path)
      Reloads a level from file and resets all game entities. Clears all entity lists before loading the new level.
      Parameters:
      path - Path to the level JSON file
